specialAnnouncement:
We won't be singing on **22nd February.** Instead, several of the singers in Durham are going to the [Sheffield All-Day singing](https://sacredharp.uk/event/south-yorkshire-singing/).

We'll sing again in Durham on **14th March.**
text: ***We sing every 2nd and 4th Saturday of the month from 2pm to 4pm*** at ***[Antioch House, 66 Crossgate, Durham, DH1 4PR](#venue)***.
